comments: Professeur au Lycée de Laval. Worked with H.Lév. on Flore de la Mayenne, see Monde Pl., 4: 269-271 (1894), Bull. Acad. Géogr. Bot., 8: 77-78 (1899), mycol. article.
examples: Trifolium meduanense Mercier & H.Lév. in Bull. Acad. Geogr. Bot. 13: 287 (1904), nom. nud.
source: Barnhart, Biogr. Notes upon Bot. (1965).; dates from Boris Heuer
